m_szDocTitle: Pininfarina converts hydrogen into speed - Roadshow
m_szDocSumamry: Pininfarina converts hydrogen into speed Here's everything we loved from Day 2 of the 2016 Geneva Motor Show Pininfarina converts hydrogen into speed With its H2 Speed car, shown off here at the Geneva Motor Show, the Italian automotive designer debuts an environmentally friendly race car that uses hydrogen to generate electricity. Wayne Cunningham Wayne Cunningham reviews cars and writes about automotive technology for CNET's Roadshow. Prior to the automotive beat, he covered spyware, Web building technologies, and computer hardware. He began covering technology and the Web in 1994 as an edit
